msg: Implemented simple entity manager/scanner with just the bare
essentials to get the document scanner to work. This is on a
branch so that I can keep a minimal (albeit inefficient)
entity scanner working even though more advanced entity
scanner development is ongoing in the "xerces_j_2" branch.
